item.description:
the daylight hours are getting shorter for the kayaking, hiking, volleyball,etc. so its time to plan another meetup at The Midnight Rodeo Bar for a full night of country Music & Dance & Lessons.

The Midnight Rodeo Bar is located in the Yard Restaurant in Manchester, NH
Doors Open at 7:00pm
Line Dance Lessons 7:30 - 8:30pm
Live Band 9:00pm - 12:30am Featuring: The Tom Dixon band
cover charge $10.

"Tom Dixon is an up-and-coming singer/songwriter, whose style is a unique combination of smooth country vocals and southern rock. His personal talents have given birth to a new way of delivering that sweet country sound, with a heart-pumping, foot-stomping beat that can only be viewed as a bit spicy, smooth, southern country rock."

So come on and join us Saturday October 23rd for a fun night of dancing, or to just
kick back with friends and listen to some great country tunes from The Tom Dixon band.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Live Country Music and Dancing and Lessons
